headline: Is Intuit (INTU) Now An Opportunity After Sharp 1 Year Share Price Pullback?
summary: Investors may be wondering if Intuit at around US$409 is starting to look like value, or if the price still reflects high expectations for the future. The share price has moved around recently, with a 7.5% gain over the last 7 days but declines of 24.1% over 30 days, 35.0% year to date and 32.9% over the past year, leaving only modest 2.1% and 10.5% returns over 3 and 5 years. These swings have come as Intuit continues to attract attention for its role in tax preparation and small business...

headline: Intuit Inc. (INTU) Announces Financial Results for Fiscal Q2 2026
summary: Intuit Inc. (NASDAQ:INTU) is one of the best cheap blue chip stocks to buy according to analysts. On February 26, Intuit Inc. (NASDAQ:INTU) announced financial results for fiscal Q2 2026, which ended January 31, 2026, reporting total revenue of $4.7 billion, up 17%. The company also grew Global Business Solutions revenue to $3.2 billion, up […]

headline: Intuit price target lowered to $558 from $696 at Oppenheimer
summary: Oppenheimer analyst Scott Schneeberger lowered the firm’s price target on Intuit (INTU) to $558 from $696 and keeps an Outperform rating on the shares. The firm notes Q2 results exceeded its estimates and guidance. Oppenheimer is lowering its price target as Intuit’s stock has endured pressure from perceived AI competitive threats.
